alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, northeastern Lake, northwestern Orange and central Volusia Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fruitland to Forest City. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Sanford, Apopka, and Altamonte Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
